programmes.show_description: 30 years & 4 hours of classic rock bands, in order from 1965-1995! Expect to see The Stones, The Who, Joan Jett, Aerosmith, AC/DC, Queen, Genesis & The Beatles.
Rounding off the week with rock classics and anthems! We guarantee AC/DC, Nirvana, Queen, Meat Loaf, Bon Jovi & much more!
Starting back in 1972, An hour of Anthems and the biggest rock songs from the king of glam rock David Bowie!
Rounding off the week with rock classics and anthems! We guarantee AC/DC, Nirvana, Queen, Meat Loaf, Bon Jovi & much more!
Crammed full with extraordinary finds, hidden treasures, and plenty of old relics! From AC/DC and Led Zep, to Bowie and Black Sabbath - how many of these family heirlooms do you own?
Rounding off the week with rock classics and anthems! We guarantee AC/DC, Nirvana, Queen, Meat Loaf, Bon Jovi & much more!
50 legendary rock tracks you absolutely know - but how fast can you name them? One thing's for sure: after the first riff, they'll be stuck in your head all night long!
Rounding off the week with rock classics and anthems! We guarantee AC/DC, Nirvana, Queen, Meat Loaf, Bon Jovi & much more!
Mark Goodier brings you our exclusive chart of the 100 biggest rock songs of the 80s, based on streaming data, historic sales info, and enduring global appeal. Crank this up LOUD!
Number 1 rock songs from the last 50 years! With mega hits from the Arctic Monkeys & KOL right back to legends like The Stones & T.Rex!
Turn it up to 11 for the finest rock anthems! Featuring Kings Of Leon, The Killers, Green Day, Biffy Clyro & The Foo Fighters. This is Now Rock!
An hour of Nu Metal from the likes of Alien Ant Farm, Evanescence and Limp Bizkit to Korn, Linkin Park and Rage Against The Machine.
99 anthems of rock from the decade that dominated the genre! With Aerosmith, Bon Jovi, Nirvana, Skunk Anansie, Meat Loaf and U2.
Claire Sturgess relives her 50 greatest heroes with the rock music that defined the 00s! Blink, MCR, Razorlight and Kings of Leon are all in the top 10 - but who's at number 1?
From 2003 to 2015 - 30 minutes of the biggest rock songs from Muse!
Number 1 rock songs from the last 50 years! With mega hits from the Arctic Monkeys & KOL right back to legends like The Stones & T.Rex!
Standby to pay homage to the best front men and leading ladies that the world of rock has produced! From Grace Slick and Christine McVie to Ozzy Osbourne and Jimi Hendrix.
